verses.verse: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David לְהַזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> to bring to remembrance אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> [Make haste] O God לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <WH5337> to deliver יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> me O LORD לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <WH5833> to help חֽוּשָֽׁה׃ <WH2363> me make haste

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <WH954> Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּרוּ֮ <WH2659> and confounded מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <WH1245> that seek נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> after my soul יִסֹּ֣גוּ <WH5472> let them be turned אָ֭חוֹר <WH268> backward וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ <WH3637> and put to confusion חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י <WH2655> that desire רָעָתִֽי׃ <WH7451> my hurt

יָ֭שׁוּבוּ <WH7725> Let them be turned back עַל־ <WH5921> for עֵ֣קֶב <WH6118> for a reward בָּשְׁתָּ֑ם <WH1322> of their shame הָ֝אֹמְרִ֗ים <WH559> that say הֶ֘אָ֥ח ׀ <WH1889> Aha הֶאָֽח׃ <WH1889> aha

יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <WH7797> thee rejoice וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ ׀ <WH8055> and be glad בְּךָ֗ כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ <WH1245> Let all those that seek וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> say תָ֭מִיד <WH8548> continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <WH1431> be magnified אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> Let God אֹ֝הֲבֵ֗י <WH157> in thee and let such as love יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3444> thy salvation

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <WH589> I עָנִ֣י <WH6041> But I [am] poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ <WH34> and needy אֱלֹהִ֪ים <WH430> unto me O God חֽוּשָׁ֫ה־ <WH2363> make haste לִּ֥י עֶזְרִ֣י <WH5828> thou [art] my help וּמְפַלְטִ֣י <WH6403> and my deliverer אַ֑תָּה <WH859> O יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD אַל־ <WH408> not תְּאַחַֽר׃ <WH309> make no tarrying
